headline: QUIZ: NYC 102
description: How well do you know your basic NYC history?
question: Malcom X was assassinated in the Audubon Auditorium in which NYC borough?
According to legend, Staten Island is part of New York and not New Jersey because:
answer: Any island that could be circumnavigated from New York within 24 hours was rightful property of New York.
a: Archduke Theodore Staten's wife was partial to shopping in Manhattan
b: New Jersey didn't really want it all that much.
c: Any island that could be circumnavigated from New York within 24 hours was rightful property of New York.

question: Who is the only U.S president buried in New York City?
The NYC subway system began its first voyage from which NYC landmark?
Times Square is named after which newspaper?
This New York politician threw out the ceremonial first pitch at the first game at Yankee Stadium
The opening of the Brooklyn Bridge in 1883 put an end to:
a: People canoeing across the East River and disrupting shipping lanes
c: Private water taxis for the wealthy

question: Why did New Amsterdam become New York?
answer: Following its capture by the English in 1664, New Amsterdamâ€™s name was changed to New York in honor of the Duke of York.
a: The native Lenape Indians couldn't pronounce the Dutch Nieuw Amsterdam so it was changed to something with fewer syllables.
b: The Dutch settlers didn't want to be reminded of the country they left behind.
c: Early fur traders from North Yorkshire, England drastically increased commerce in the city and political leaders changed the name to honor them.

question: With no change of subway trains, how long is the journey from 207th Street in Manhattan to Far Rockaway in Queens?
